1.content: (this doesn't actually have to be IN a competition. you can battle with anyone.) You set out on your first day with your first pokemon and it's quite the beast for a beginner.
1.title: First day

info.brief_description: A competitive snack for a pokemon.
info.description: Like the Brief Description says, You compete in a tournament and whoever loses gets eaten. I know this interactive USED to be called Riddle Me This but that sounded dumb.
